attributes.action: GIVE THE GENERAL PUBLIC A REFERENDUM ON IMMIGRATION
attributes.background: WE THE GENERAL PUBLIC WOULD LIKE A REFERENDUM ON IMMIGRATION. WE HAVE TOO MANY COMING IN AND WE HAVE NO SAY ABOUT THIS

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand you're concerned about the level of immigration, but we're not sure what you'd like the Government to hold a referendum to decide on. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
